title: Position mission icon next to folder icon with proper spacing

requirements.summary: Position the mission icon (MissionsButton component) next to the folder icon (FoldersButton component) with appropriate spacing between them for visual separation
acceptanceCriteria: Mission icon appears horizontally adjacent to folder icon
Spacing between the two icons provides clear visual distinction
Both icons maintain their existing functionality
No other application features or behaviors are modified

file_operations.description: Update the FoldersButton component positioning to support horizontal layout with the MissionsButton. Adjust fixed positioning styles to accommodate side-by-side placement while maintaining existing hover effects, pulse animation support, and accessibility attributes.

Update the MissionsButton component positioning to align horizontally next to FoldersButton with appropriate spacing (e.g., using margin or gap). Ensure the button maintains its disabled state handling, pulse animation, z-index control, and existing functionality while adapting to the new horizontal layout.

Update the HomePage component to render FoldersButton and MissionsButton in a horizontal container with appropriate spacing between them. Ensure the container maintains proper positioning on the page and both buttons remain accessible and functional. Verify that no other UI elements or features are affected by this layout change.
